query:
SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt, 'time_series' as tbl FROM time_series
UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*), 'documents' FROM documents
UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*), 'economic_events' FROM economic_events
UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*), 'glossary_terms' FROM glossary_terms
UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*), 'indicators' FROM indicators
UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*), 'sources' FROM sources
UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*), 'users' FROM users
UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*), 'scheduler_jobs' FROM scheduler_jobs;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4DB9hJWqLzCzJpD.4ae2ba9639dc --database XodoyKMzPdFiKkVj3QFTGK --execute SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt, 'time_series' as tbl FROM time_series
UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*), 'documents' FROM documents
UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*), 'economic_events' FROM economic_events
UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*), 'glossary_terms' FROM glossary_terms
UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*), 'indicators' FROM indicators
UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*), 'sources' FROM sources
UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*), 'users' FROM users
UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*), 'scheduler_jobs' FROM scheduler_jobs;
